title: Runrun.it
description: Runrun.it is a task, time and performance management software for companies, which formalizes the existing workflow, keeps documents and decisions organized, and priorities clear. Runrun.it increases your company's productivity by 25%, on average. Over 100,000 companies in 107 countries already use Runrun.it.We offer a 14-day trial for free. After that period, it is necessary to choose one of the premium plans to keep using the app. Check out pricing and join the fast lane at http://runrun.itFeatures: TASK MANAGEMENT Runrun.it's app allows users to manage their tasks using the same features of web app: create tasks, work, pause, comment, attach files, create checklist, schedule tasks, workflow, include followers and edit all information. TEAM MANAGEMENT By tracking their delivery tasks, timeliness and quality, Runrun.it helps measure your team's productivity. On "Teams" page you can see what each one is doing in real time, when they will be free to receive new tasks, the next tasks to be done and their RR-Rating (performance grade). EVERYBODY ON THE SAME PAGE You can send messages to all users of your account on Bulletin, or just to people on your team. Furthermore, you can exchange general content with everybody.
descriptionHTML:
Runrun.it is a task, time and performance management software for companies, which formalizes the existing workflow, keeps documents and decisions organized, and priorities clear. Runrun.it increases your company's productivity by 25%, on average. Over 100,000 companies in 107 countries already use Runrun.it.

We offer a 14-day trial for free. After that period, it is necessary to choose one of the premium plans to keep using the app. Check out pricing and join the fast lane at http://runrun.it

Features:

TASK MANAGEMENT
Runrun.it's app allows users to manage their tasks using the same features of web app: create tasks, work, pause, comment, attach files, create checklist, schedule tasks, workflow, include followers and edit all information.

TEAM MANAGEMENT
By tracking their delivery tasks, timeliness and quality, Runrun.it helps measure your team's productivity. On "Teams" page you can see what each one is doing in real time, when they will be free to receive new tasks, the next tasks to be done and their RR-Rating (performance grade).

EVERYBODY ON THE SAME PAGE
You can send messages to all users of your account on Bulletin, or just to people on your team. Furthermore, you can exchange general content with everybody.
comments: Quando clica pra ver um anexo ele abre o navegador só que aparece o block do runrun.it pra usar o app. O site te obriga a usar o app e o app redireciona pro site... Que beleza

Caro.  Valor para pequenas empresas e absurdo e não se paga principalmente por ser mensal. São 300 reais/ano por usuário. Considerando uma equipe pequena de 5 pessoas são 1500 reais. Pensando que uma equipe pequena toca 6 ou 7 projetos e que você tem que pagar isso de forma perpétua... Pagaria esse valor numa licença definitiva, mas pagar 125 reais de "mensalidade", não rola, então sim, considero caro.
Muito bom. Útil, cumprindo o que promete!

A sincronização não funciona Muito obrigado por corrigir o problema da notificação, mas o problema com a sincronização parece que piorou viu. Firebase é uma ótima solução para esse problema do aplicativo.
